first_para: Fiona Claire Bruce (born 26 March 1957) is a Scottish Conservative Party politician who is the Member of Parliament for Congleton, elected at the 2010 general election.

full.extract: Fiona Claire Bruce (born 26 March 1957) is a Scottish Conservative Party politician who is the Member of Parliament for Congleton, elected at the 2010 general election.
full.title: Fiona Bruce (politician)
